article.headline: Cliche "Welcome to my Blog" first post
article.body:
Ive just finished (mostly) writing this blog, or at least the code behind it. Welcome!

Using nothing but a text editor (big thankyou to Sublime Text 2) ive managed to create this blog from PHP and a sprinkle of JavaScript. Any suggestions or feedback is most welcome, just contact me. I plan to update this site throughout the year with posts and homemade projects (such as a few android/html5 games) in additon to projects completed during my studies at Flinders University.

Thanks for reading, now, next job on the list is to complete the blogs mobile version.
